text: Buguo, jiaru shihou faxian ta lia you fanzui de xianyi [huo qianke], name, rang qinshu zhong zui you fayan quan de lingwai liang ren daiti ta lia zuozheng. Ta lia dang yi an la fashi:“[Women xuanshi]: Women de zuozheng bi ta lia de zuozheng geng zhenshi, women bu weibei zhenli, fouze, women bi shi bu yi zhe.”
